org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport
Class TcpMessageInputStream

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport.MessageInputStream
      org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport.TcpMessageInputStream

public class TcpMessageInputStream
extends MessageInputStream

The TcpMessageInputStream reads a message and the hanshaking from a TcpConnection.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06

Method Detail

readHandshake

public SenderHandshakeMessage readHandshake()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Reads the handshake from a TCP connection.

Specified by:
readHandshake in class MessageInputStream
Returns:
the SenderHandshakeMessage if handshake could be sucessfully read from the connection and is valid, null otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if handshake couldn't be read from the input stream.

processMessage

public void processMessage()
                    throws java.io.IOException
Reads a message from the TCP stream. The TCP protocol specified in Reader Protocol Proposal from March, 10 2006 is required to properly read the message payloads. A message can be splitted into several chunks.

Specified by:
processMessage in class MessageInputStream
Throws:
java.io.IOException
